message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm still confident you'll see the value in this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1350000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
